abstract: Six major stores, including Walmart and Costco, joined in the deal with New York’s attorney general. But there was one holdout, Amazon.
snippet: Six major stores, including Walmart and Costco, joined in the deal with New York’s attorney general. But there was one holdout, Amazon.
lead_paragraph: Is that television-size box of graham crackers at Costco really a better deal than a standard box at Walmart? Soon, online customers won’t have to do the math to figure it out.

headline.main: Big Retailers Agree to List Unit Prices on Websites
headline.print_headline: Big Retailers Agree to List Unit Prices on Websites
